description: Mountain Hardwear's lightest three-layer ski shell designed with GORE-TEX® C-Knit™ shell fabric for turn-earners who like to go deep and ride off the beaten path, the High Exposure™ boasts an articulated, full-zip construction that's stretchy, durable and waterproof with unparalleled breathability.
name: High Exposure GTX C-Knit Jacket - Womens
